name: Dampened Spirits
description:
Mark's longtime rival Brandon is dead, and Mark can't wait to buy his company and close it down. But a nasty storm forces Mark to confront his past.

Use A and D keys to walk and W to climb. Move the mouse side to side to aim Mark's umbrella. Press space to carry, drop, and place objects. Be careful -- Mark can't use his umbrella while carrying and climbing!

Known issues:

  • You can get stuck if you fall off the fire escape into the wreck in the third level. Proceed with caution and make sure you get that plank in place, and everything should be fine... ;-)
  • Redemptive/good ending sometimes crashes or is blacked out. :-(

Made for NDJam3!

  • Theme: A dark and stormy night
  • Optional sub-themes:
    • Antagonist in mourning
    • Rhyming dialogue
    • Astronaut and Jolly

The team:

  • Luke Ford (FordAudioDesign) - Music and SFX
  • Aleece Harmon (aaleaf) - Art and animation
  • Joshua S. Robinson (WordyRobin) - Writing and programming
  • Henry Vargas (hvargas2) - Level design
